title: [POLL] Would you enjoy a stream based entirely around the funny, quick gameplay of Bronze?
body: I'm a Bronzie and was thinking of starting a stream so people can just enjoy watching a dumb Bronze game. When you watch pro streams you can pretty much tell who is going to win and what is going to happen in the first 5 minutes and I'm tired of watching it and it's boring as hell. I want to see the Bronze throws, the endless kill-fests, etc. of Bronze in its fully r%%%%%ed glory. How about you?

replies.body: I would only watch a bronze player stream if they were like tyler1 and just inted the fuck out of people

> [{quoted}](name=HalcyonDweller,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=U8cs0ucj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-04-24T21:26:00.837+0000)
>
> That's really shitty.

once you get so bored with this game theres only so much that can keep you interested, i dont int cause i'm not a dick but watching other people do it is pretty funny

Regardless, you shouldn't encourage others to int. It's toxic for the game, and it ruins peoples' fun.

If you're bored with League then you should take a break from it and go play other games.
Well in all likelyhood he's just a shitty person.
I was talking about the act of encouraging / enjoying others inting. Not about the commenter directly.
Oh, I know.  I wasn't.  If he gets his jollies that way there's a REAL good chance he's a bit of a twatwaffle.
Fair enough, and I do not disagree with you.

Is SaltyTeemo still around?

It's exactly what you're suggesting, a stream of low bronze gameplay.
Yes, i think he streams everyday still.
I believe its automated and goes on indefinitely
Not unless you are bronze 5. Got to keep it professional you know?
i voted no because i love "stfu u bronze" but you should totally do the stream
SaltyTeemo is an automated livestream of Bronze games. You can even place bets on teams

Great, all we need to do is clone Hansishnin 9 times and we got ourselves a Bronze level stream.
https://i.imgflip.com/nd0fs.jpg
It could be fun.  There is a stream called Salty Teemo that does non-stop low Elo games set to dramatic music and it's pretty fun.
Let's make a video series called Unranked to Bronze
I'd watch it, as long as you highlight the most Brunze things ever. It'd be like watching Wood Division Adventures! :P
